[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_by_version()] [Version Boundary Check] Can integer overflow in version comparison (version > ledger_info.version()) be exploited with u64::MAX versions? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_by_version()] [Pruning Race] Can rapid pruning cause oldest_version() to advance past a version being queried, causing VersionTooOld errors for recent transactions? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list()] [Pagination Overflow] Can the page.compute_start() calculation overflow when start + limit exceeds u64::MAX, causing incorrect transaction ranges to be returned? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list()] [Timestamp Race] Can get_block_timestamp() return timestamps that don't match the transactions being rendered, causing temporal inconsistencies in API responses? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_transactions()] [Start Version Manipulation] Can an attacker submit start versions beyond the ledger version to probe for future transactions or cause internal errors? (Low)
[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_transactions()] [Limit Exhaustion] Can an attacker request the maximum limit repeatedly to cause excessive storage reads and API slowdowns? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list_ordered_txns_by_account()] [Sequence Number Gaps] Can sequence number gaps in account transactions cause the pagination logic to skip or duplicate transactions? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list_ordered_txns_by_account()] [Account Verification] Does the Account::new() verification properly check account existence, or can non-existent accounts return empty transaction lists without error? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list_txn_summaries_by_account()] [Version Range Overlap] Can overlapping start_version and end_version parameters cause duplicate transactions in summaries? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list_txn_summaries_by_account()] [Orderless Transaction Inclusion] Does the function properly include orderless transactions in summaries, or can they be missed due to indexing issues? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list_auxiliary_infos()] [Iterator Exhaustion] Can the get_persisted_auxiliary_info_iterator() return more results than the limit, causing excessive memory consumption? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: list_auxiliary_infos()] [Auxiliary Data Integrity] Can auxiliary info corruption or inconsistencies cause the iterator to return invalid data that crashes API response serialization? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_transaction_inner()] [BCS Serialization Divergence] Can differences between JSON and BCS serialization of TransactionData cause inconsistent responses for the same transaction? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_transaction_inner()] [State View Consistency] Can the state_view obtained from latest_state_view_poem() be stale, causing converter operations to fail with inconsistent state errors? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: simulate()] [User Transaction Unpacking] Can non-UserTransaction results from simulation cause the unpacking logic to fail, leaking that simulation internally uses different transaction types? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: simulate()] [VM Status Message Injection] Can malicious contracts cause the VMStatus message field to contain crafted error messages that exploit log parsing or error display systems? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: estimate_gas_price()] [BCS Gas Estimation] Does the BCS response for gas estimation omit the prioritized/deprioritized estimates, causing BCS clients to lack critical gas information? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_transaction_by_hash_inner()] [Async Spawn Race] Can the api_spawn_blocking() call create race conditions where ledger_info becomes stale between retrieval and transaction conversion? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: wait_transaction_by_hash_inner()] [Loop Race] Can the async polling loop in wait_transaction_by_hash_inner() race with transaction commitment, causing missed notifications? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: create_batch()] [Batch Iteration Race] Can concurrent batch submissions cause mempool to process transactions in different orders than submitted, violating sequence number expectations? (Medium)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: simulate_transaction()] [State View Race] Can the state_view captured for simulation become outdated during long-running simulations, causing divergence from actual execution? (Medium)
[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_by_hash()] [Spawn Blocking Join] Can the spawn_blocking task for reading from DB fail to join, causing transaction lookups to hang indefinitely? (Low)

[File: api/src/transactions.rs] [Function: get_signed_transaction()] [Error Context Leakage] Do the detailed error messages from context() calls leak internal implementation details that could aid attackers? (Low)
